title: Sports events turn out to be a moneyspinner for hotels
description: Cricket matches and other sporting events are fast becoming significant contributors to India's hospitality industry, hoteliers said, citing Ahmedabad's skyrocketing room rates ahead of the India-Pakistan Cricket World Cup match as example.
